name: showMobileControls
content: Changes the mobile controls visible beneath the play space.

palette_params.name: spaceButtonVisible
palette_params.description: Indicates whether the space button should be visible.

palette_params.name: dpadFourWay
palette_params.description: Indicates whether the controls for only the four cardinal directions should be visible.

palette_params.name: mobileOnly
palette_params.description: Indicates whether the controls should appear on mobile devices only (`true`), or on all devices (`false`).

short_description: Changes the mobile controls visible beneath the play space.
